ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: ... it can t just be justifiable based on time and effort, it must also be balanced with respect to other classes.  for example, you can t create a 2 damage 1
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:31 AM 6/13/00 -1000, you wrote:
>Thats the entire point behind the original poster's idea. IMO, its
>completely justifiable based on the time and effort required to obtain the
>armor.
>
>Galtin of E'ci

it can't just be justifiable based on time and effort, it must also be balanced
with respect to other classes. for example, you can't create a 2 damage
1 delay sword that is bard only usable, then say oh it's balanced because
it takes 1000 hours to get it. the time/difficulty it takes to get it is only part
of the equation.
